results.content: Great course, learnt a great amount about creating the basic functionality for a Saas application - would highly recommend. I had to resort to content outside of this course for one lecture as the Heroku MongoDB app used in the current lecture was now discontinued; hence the 4 star rating (rather than 5)

results.content: Thanks for a great course.  I was able to develop strong SaaS fundamentals from it. It was also very informative and we used quite a few other apps to help connect the dots and test different parts of the functionality. I would certainly recommend this course to others.
results.content_html: Thanks for a great course. I was able to develop strong SaaS fundamentals from it. It was also very informative and we used quite a few other apps to help connect the dots and test different parts of the functionality. I would certainly recommend this course to others.

results.content:
The good: The code and way of structuring the app is really good and I learned a lot. 

The bad: This is more a code-along course than a teaching course. The presenter clicks through things quickly or doesn't explain what they did and you are forced to freeze frame and rewind often to understand what he did. The presenter seems to have stopped answering questions four months ago. There are questions from then that remain unanswered. His code has errors in certain places and he does not publish fixes. He has two sets of classes for the same thing and no explanation for which set to use. An example of an error that remains unfixed is that when a user cancels their subscription to your service, their account is immediately eliminated instead of being set to cancel at the end of their current billing period. A lack of social login is also glaring in its absence (most SaaS apps support this nowadays).
results.content_html:

An example of an error that remains unfixed is that when a user cancels their subscription to your service, their account is immediately eliminated instead of being set to cancel at the end of their current billing period. results.content: great boilerplate, great videos. Instructor is sympathetic and professional.
results.content_html: great boilerplate, great videos. Instructor is sympathetic and professional.

results.content: I've purchased a lot of courses on programming. This is probably the best course I've taken - why? It covers real world needs in one of my favorite tech stacks - MERN - javascript front and back makes so much sense. So many courses leave you with a bunch of half baked demo pieces - this could be the base for a real world app. I like how the course moves quickly - I figure if you need more info/theory you can google it. The instructor is very responsive which is a plus. Almost done with the course - it's been fun!

results.content: The instructor has covered everything there is to create a SAAS app. This course has helped me start my own app, while helping me save a ton of time in google search.
results.content_html: The instructor has covered everything there is to create a SAAS app. This course has helped me start my own app, while helping me save a ton of time in google search.

results.content: I love the articulate, highly practical approach to building an app in a weekend. I already had experience making small SAAS apps but this helped take me to the next level and see all of the steps in  rapid, logical progression. Awesome!
results.content_html: I love the articulate, highly practical approach to building an app in a weekend. I already had experience making small SAAS apps but this helped take me to the next level and see all of the steps in rapid, logical progression. Awesome!

results.content: This course was very well laid out and extremely helpful for someone like me, in my initial stages of building a SAAS application. The way things were explained and demonstrated made it really convenient for me to pick the concepts and do it on my own.
results.content_html: This course was very well laid out and extremely helpful for someone like me, in my initial stages of building a SAAS application. The way things were explained and demonstrated made it really convenient for me to pick the concepts and do it on my own.

results.content: Very informative so far and looks like a well planned course. Its packed with useful information without the faff. The flow through the lectures is also quite smooth.

results.content: This course covers a lot of real-world knowledge and essential fundamental concepts that are worth taking. Now, subscriptions with Stripe have no secret. I highly recommend taking this course.
